metadata.title: Blackout Window Roller Blinds, Green Faux Linen Textured Fabric Room Darkening and White Sheer Light Filtering Dual Roller Shades in One Track, Custom Made Sun Shades for Windows, Doors
features: DESCRIPTION: Dual window roller shade is composed with white sheer and high-end blackout shade.White sheer blind allows natural light and permit outdoor view.Blackout blind is faux linen textured fabric can block 100% light and UV ray, provide privacy and good sleeping.You can install sheer or blackout fabric in front.Two fabric are controlled by 2 systems and can up and down seperately.Easily switch day and night in one window.High-luxury shades are more suitable for offices,meeting rooms.

ORDER CONFIRMATION: The light filtering shade is ONLY WHITE sheer fabric. The blackout roller shade can be choosed from color list. You can choose the BLCKOUT color you want then click the "Customize Now" and leave customized information. We will send email to you to reconfirm the size in 24 hours, pls reply us ASAP. If we don't get your reply in 48 hours, we will make the shade as you customized. The more accurate the information and more timely the reply, the faster the product will arrive.

INSIDE MOUNT WIDTH: Inside mount require a MIN 4" window frame depth. You need choose the exact WINDOW inside width and height to place order,then we will minu 0.25" (as the mounting space) based on your window width to the final shade width. For example, if your window inside are 35.75" wide by 42" high, select 35"W and 12/16" as the order width, select 42"H as the order height, the roller shade you get will be 35.5" Wide (total shade is 35.5"W, shade fabric part is 34.3"W ) by 42" High.

OUTSIDE MOUNT WIDTH: The shade width and length should be 3" to 10" wider than window size for better coverage. You need choose the FINAL SHADE width and height to place order. For example, if your window is 40.75" wide by 58" height, the shade should be at least 44" wide by 63" high, you need to select 44" W and 63" H to place order. We will make no deduction, you will get the exact shade size as you ordered as 44"W by 63"H. For outside mount, if there is enough space, the bigger the better.

SHIPPING: WE DO NOT DELIVER TO PO BOX and APO ADDRESSES. Courier companies do not deliver to PO boxes and the shades are too long to Post. When you shop from us, we will make sure your project to be a success. No matter if you made a mistake or there are other issues, you will be covered. Any question you can contact us by Amazon email.
description: Inside mounted shades will have a deduction taken of approximately 1/4" to ensure a proper fit inside the window frame.Inside mounted shades require a minimum frame depth of 2.5inch for secure installation. If your window frame depth is less than 2.5inch please select outside mount.Outside mounted shades should be ordered with the exact width of the area you wish to cover. Outside mounts are often used when there is not sufficient frame depth for inside mounting.Our shades come with all mounting hardware, and mounting hardware for both inside mount and outside mount
Measure the inside frame width at three locations-the top,middle,and bottom. Record the smallest of the 3 measurements and use that number deduct 1/4inch as your inside width when ordering.
Measure the height at 3 locations-the left,middle,and right side. Record the smallest of the 3 measurements and use the number as your inside width when ordering.
Measure the outside frame width adding 6-10inch to be the outside mount width.
Measure the outside frame length adding 5-10inch to be the outside mount length. The overlap it recommended to allow appropriate coverage and avoid any light gaps.
